conbody.p: roll call registrationThe teacher might want to take attendance at the start of a lesson. Select ClassRoll call from the menu to initiate student roll call registration. A window will appear on student screens ( ) where they can enter their name and/or student ID number (depending on the school policies). The students have 60 seconds to complete the roll call. Failure to do so will result in the student panel marked with a red X mark ( ).
Status bar of the teacher module window will show time remaining for the roll call. You can stop the roll call early by selecting ClassRoll call menu again.
The Roll call results window ( ) will appear on your screen after registration is completed.
Right click on a student panel and select Change name from the pop-up menu to change student's name and/or ID number after the roll call. Enter the new name into Enter name window ( ).
If for whatever reasons there appears to be a duplicate student name in the class, one of them will be displayed in red and marked with the (!) sign ( ).
